description:
Sung Kang has closed a deal to join the Starz drama series “Power”.成康已经确定出演了Starz的电视剧《权欲》。

The drama from Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson and creator Courtney A. Kemp was recently given a two season renewal by the network and is currently airing on Sunday nights.这部剧是由柯蒂斯杰克逊也就是“五十美分”担任制片人，考特尼A坎普担任编剧，最近两季网上一般都在周日晚上播放。

Details behind Kang’s role are unknown at this time. “Power” is executive produced by Jackson and Kemp and stars Omari Hardwick. It is produced by Jackson’s G-Unit Films and Television. 此次成康的角色细节尚不清楚。《权欲》是由杰克逊和坎普还有巨星奥马里哈德维克，由杰克逊的G-Uine影视公司拍摄。

Best known for playing the role of Han in the billion-dollar “Fast and Furious” franchise, Sung has been working in the Chinese market and was last seen in the Chinese films “Hollywood Adventures” and “Pali Road.” He was recently seen in the Sundance Grand Jury Prize-nominated film “The Free World” and was previously one of the leads in the Fox’s “Gang Related.”众所周知的是在十亿美元票房的电影《速度与激情》里面饰演Han，成康一直在中国市场还有中国影片中出现，像《好莱坞历险记》、《夏威夷之恋》。他最近出现是由于他的电影《自由世界》获得戛纳电影节评审大奖提名，以前是Fox的电视剧《黑白道》主演之一。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 《速度与激情》演员成康加盟《权欲》！
